channel.title: Web3.php on Ethan Kuo Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web3.php on Ethan Kuo Blog

item.title: Web3 Usage (Backend-PHP)
item.description: Preface I’ve completed two DAPPs so far last year, and I have some knowledge of Web3, and this is a record of the usage of the Backend library web3.php. Web3 Usage (Front-end) Web3 Usage (Backend-Golang) Installation Web3.php If you are using Laravel 8 or below, i.e. GuzzleHttp 6.x, you can install sc0vu/web3.php In composer.json find the following and modify it 1 "minimum-stability": "dev" Then 1 2 composer require sc0vu/web3.php dev-master composer require web3p/ethereum-tx //如果需要发送交易 If using Laravel 8 or above i.
